entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 02:24 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 02:24 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
